text: int main ( ) { int i , j , k , n , tc [ 1000 ] , tri [ 100 ] [ 101 ] , max ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & tc [ i ] ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < tc [ i ] ; j ++ ) { tri [ j ] [ 0 ] = 0 ; for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & tri [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ) ; tri [ j ] [ 0 ] += tri [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ; } } max = tri [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 1 ; j < tc [ i ] ; j ++ ) if ( max < tri [ j ] [ 0 ] ) max = tri [ j ] [ 0 ] ; tc [ i ] = max ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) printf ( "%d \n" , tc [ i ] ) ; return 0 ; }
